name: Collaboration 6
description:
Watch our trailer!

6 indie game developers decided to unite and make games about one single theme. Theme started with a slime creature that can divide itself; each games are about the previous ones. Here you'll find 6 games with different gameplays.

Games and developers are

  • Divide & Conquer (Tarık Kaya)
  • Slime Revolution (Serkan Pekçetin)
  • There Is No Turning B.E.C.K. (Ozan Emirhan Bayyurt)
  • Ethical Dilemma (Talha Kaya)
  • Cigersis (Uğurcan Orçun)
  • Divide & Burn (Ahmet Kamil Keleş)
